google_reviews.author: Alexandra and Raul Montes de Oca
google_reviews.review: I am so grateful to have worked with Michelle and James to find our new family home. They were incredible supports working with us on our out-of-state move, making sure that everything from financing to showings were in sync with our familys tight timeline. We could not have asked for better agents who took the time to really listen to and understand our needs, pre-vetted properties, thoughtfully answered questions around the clock, and were strategic in setting up offers that helped us land an incredible property for our family. Thank you, Michelle and James! It was pleasure and I couldnt recommend them more.

google_reviews.author: Gil Parsons
google_reviews.review:
Michelle and James were A1 from day one. They traveled half way around Puget Sound to meet us and show the property of our dreams. Their diligence, responsiveness, and sense of calm guided through the process with relative ease. We closed in a little over 3 weeks to have the most magical weekend in our new home. Thank you Michelle and James for taking this journey with us. You are  both knowledgeable and skilled at what you do and your vibe as humans deserves to be known and appreciated. Thanks again.
Gil and Sunlight.

owner_response.text: It was a pleasure working with you to find your dreamy A-frame cabin getaway!

google_reviews.author: Jason Miller
google_reviews.review: The team at Prosper Northwest is amazing! Paul and Dave are super friendly and knowledgeable and helped us narrow in on the perfect house for us. Once we had the right house in our sights, Louisa absolutely crushed it getting the deal done! Hopefully we will not be buying a house again anytime soon, but if the need was to arise, Prosper Northwest would be our first call!

owner_response.text: Jason, thank you so much for your kind words! It was a true pleasure working with you and Lauren. We are delighted that you are enjoying your new home!

google_reviews.author: Christy Fetterman
google_reviews.review:
I dont think I can give Prosper Northwest Real Estate a high enough review. 5 stars is simply not enough!!
Dave helped us on both the purchase and the sell of our mountain home. Both went smoothly and stress free! Dave and his team are truly a pleasure to work with. Highly, highly recommend.

owner_response.text: Christy, it was so great working with you and Kevin. We are grateful for your kind words and the trust you placed in us to help you achieve a successful outcome. Best of luck on your next big adventure!

google_reviews.author: Ryan Creek
google_reviews.review: We had a FIVE STAR experience working with Dave and the NW Real Estate Team. We had the opposite of a turnkey property. An old cabin that had not been on the market since the 1950's. Dave was able to navigate us through the preparation process as we updated the key components of the property to best position it for listing. We had to invest minimal capital and received a fair market value for our cabin. I believe both us as the seller, and the buyer, were pleased with NW Real Estate Team with the end result.

google_reviews.author: Ann Carter
google_reviews.review: Steve and I really enjoyed working with David Faigin for the sale of our cabin. Dave gave us excellent advice on how to get our property ready for sale. We loved the way he showcased our cabin with staging and beautiful photography. Dave secured us a full price cash offer within a couple of days after listing! We highly recommend Dave as a realtor who will devote his attention to all those little details that will help bring in a fast sale.

google_reviews.author: Erkvard Von Manheim
google_reviews.review: I have the best things to say about Dave Faigin and Prosper Northwest Real Estate. Great experience from start to finish. A superb communicator and always very responsive. Helped us with everything from strategy, to staging, to photography. He was only a text away at all times. If you're looking for a first rate personal touch, I highly recommend you reach out to Dave.

google_reviews.author: Sunlight P
google_reviews.review: Michelle and James are an amazing team to work with. They are very knowledgeable, attentive, prompt, honest and professional. Youre in good hands with these two who will work hard to make all your dreams come true!

owner_response.text: We had so much fun working with you Sunlight!  Thanks for trusting us with your real estate purchase!

google_reviews.author: Mary Elise Cadera
google_reviews.review: Working with Dave Faigin on the sale of my property was a breeze! It needed some basic repairs before we listed it, and Dave had his team of experts out to take care of the needful within 24 hours. As with any major real estate transaction, there were questions, concerns, and strategic decisions to be made along the way. Under Dave's guidance, each of these things was addressed quickly, efficiently, and effectively. It was my preference to stay close to the action to help out where I could, but I could have taken my hands completely off the wheel and things would have been just fine - Dave and his team had everything handled. If I had to do it all over again, without a doubt I'd pick Dave to handle this sale, hands down.

google_reviews.author: Jeremy Nyikos
google_reviews.review: What a pleasant experience! My wife and I recently bought a house and Louisa was amazing to work with. We were able to gain and share information pertaining to the house we wanted through casual and efficient conversations. Louisa was always quick to respond with answers to any questions we had. We never felt pushed or directed outside of our comfort zone. We highly recommend Prosper Northwest Real Estate and we cannot say enough nice things about Louisa!

owner_response.text: Jeremy, you and Erica are such wonderful clients! Thank you for the collaborative and joyful experience, as well as your kind words. Please don't hesitate to reach out anytime you need help in the future!

google_reviews.author: Anne Wolken
google_reviews.review: I am so thankful for the whole Prosper team for making my condo-owning dreams a reality! As a first time home buyer, I had so, so many questions, and the Prosper team was there to provide answers every step of the way. They made me feel confident, comfortable and excited. They went above and beyond getting to know me and what I value, and helped guide me seamlessly through the home buying process. Special thanks for Kristine LeRoss and the whole Prosper team!

google_reviews.author: Gage Pacifera
google_reviews.review: Calling Paul Rice an amazing realtor would not do him justicehe is so much more than that. He led my wife and I through the longest, most excruciating land purchase process imaginable, one filled with multiple sellers, a late property add, a boundary dispute, lawyer showdowns, wetland restrictions, zoning gotchas, an incredibly unhelpful lending officer and a closing process that dragged on months longer than expected. Paul navigated us through this storm with incredible patience, grace and when needed, some well-directed nudging. His talent and persistence turned what could have been a truly awful process and a failed transaction into a successful closingand now we get to build our forever home. Unwavering Real Estate Spirit Guide or Sagacious Sherpa to your Dreams would be a better title to put on his business card than realtor.

google_reviews.author: Tom Feldman
google_reviews.review: We recently had the pleasure of working with Dave when looking to purchasesome land to build our dream cabin on. From day 1, Dave was extremely responsive and had great suggestions for funding our purchase. Land can be a bit tricky and oftentimes comes with a lot of red tape,especiallywhen near a river. Dave helped us navigate the existing documentation and reached out to some local specialistson our behalf for their opinion as well. Ultimately, we felt comfortable with the purchase and decidedto move forward. We were impressed with Dave's professionalism and his genuine interest in assuring we were satisfied with our final decision on our new land. We look forward to working with him in the future.

google_reviews.author: Kim Henwood
google_reviews.review: Hands down Paul and Louisa are a great team. Our family has had 3 real estate interactions with them and every detail was thoroughly explained. Their knowledge and personal attention to their listing and/or sale made the transaction go as smoothly as possible. I highly recommend Prosper Northwest Real Estate Agency.

google_reviews.author: Nat Burgess
google_reviews.review: I have purchased several investment properties through Prosper Northwest. The team there listens carefully, understands my criteria, proposes ideas that match, but also comes through with creative and insightful ideas that had not occurred to me. Every transaction has been well-managed and seamless, due to Prosper's expert handling of negotiations and paperwork, and strong network of responsive and effective supporting professionals for title, legal, escrow, and lending.  Highly recommended.

google_reviews.author: LeeAnne Garvey
google_reviews.review: Integrity, dependability, trustworthy. These are a few of the characteristics Kat Larson maintains.  She came onboard and navigated the completion of a contract gone awry.  I won't use this arena to speak negatively of my experience prior Kat's involvement, but I will speak of her ability to jump in full throttle, advocate for me (the buyer) and ultimately close the deal. Home buying is an already stressful (and exciting) event. When, at 12 days in, I was in dire need of a new agent, Kat provided comfort, confidence, and professional assertion until closure.  I am so grateful to be in my new home; thanks to Kat. I highly recommend her!!

google_reviews.author: Emily Valencia
google_reviews.review: Lousia, Paul, and Jessie are the BOMB. I couldnt imagine working with any one else in the future or even recommending someone else to family and friends. If youre wanting TOP notch attentiveness, people who really go beyond the above and beyond, and people that get it done and get it done right, look no further my friend. Im so happy Louisa came into our lives when she did because from the start she made me feel safe about selling, then turning around and buying in this crazy market all while newly pregnant. I truly believe that quality is hard to find in a realtor let alone the whole team! These are honest and good people, with morals and good hearts. Were grateful  and now were happy in our new home too!

google_reviews.author: Guin Shabo
google_reviews.review: Amazing group to work with! I have had the privilege of working with Dave Faigin for years. He is always easy to talk to and truly cares about what is best for you. He goes above and beyond in all aspects of the purchasing process. Dave took the fear of buying my first home right out of the equation. I would highly recommend using them for your real estate needs. A true delight!

summary.text:
Good

Prosper Northwest Real Estate has received a multitude of positive reviews indicating a strong performance in meeting client expectations. Many users highlight the team's attention to detail and responsiveness. For example, one reviewer expressed gratitude for the team's ability to guide them through the home buying process, ensuring all their needs were addressed and making the experience seamless.

Additionally, clients frequently mention the personal touch that the agents provide, with many noting their commitment to genuinely understanding individual situations and preferences. This has led to clients feeling confident and supported throughout their transactions, further solidifying the company's reputation for outstanding service.

Great

User reviews highlight that clients of Prosper Northwest often experience outstanding communication and support throughout the buying or selling process. Agents like Dave, Michelle, and James receive consistent praise for their knowledge, expertise, and ability to make complex processes manageable. One user enthusiastically shared that the team went above and beyond, providing guidance at every turn and ensuring their client felt comfortable and informed.

Bad

While the majority of feedback for Prosper Northwest Real Estate is overwhelmingly positive, a notable aspect missing in user reviews is any indication of the company addressing common tenant issues like maintenance or security deposit challenges. The lack of negative reviews suggests that the company may not have had significant hurdles to overcome, possibly indicating either a stellar performance in these areas or a lack of engagement from users who might have faced such issues.

Ugly

The lack of unfavorable user reviews creates a void in understanding how Prosper Northwest Real Estate deals with truly disappointing aspects of property management or sales. Without any reports of failure to return deposits, poor maintenance response, or ineffective communication, it seems that the company’s strengths have overshadowed any potential weaknesses. However, the absence of this feedback means there’s no detailed insight into potential pitfalls clients may face if issues arise.
